column3: Latest;Kampong Thom: A------ woman was seriously injured after a man attacked her with acid.  After the incident the suspect drank the same acid in a suicide attempt.------The incident occurred at 10:30 am on November 8
column6: Kampong Thom province.------Police said that the suspect
column8: a 30-year-old male allegedly threw acid on 21-year-old Yang Sophep
column10: before consuming it himself. The motive appears to have been ------jealousy.------Both were sent to hospital
column11: the girl with serious skin burns and the man suffering serous internal injuries
